fulltext:
DUY DAO
Audio Engineer/ Sound Editor
WORK EXPERIENCE
DIGIPOST GLOBAL
march 2016 - Present
Audio Engineer
* Worked with video editors to synchronize audio with video segments
* Provided audio mixing and recording expertise to field and studio-
based productions..
* Captured and recorded audio using standard field audio equipment.
* Ensured that field and studio audio was executed at highest level of
quality, meeting producer and client expectations
* Set up, maintained, and operated audio recording equipment and
performed troubleshooting and audio system breakdown for TV, Media...
broadcasts.
* Created and maintained sound libraries and set up ambient sound
microphones for crowd and cage
* Performed high-quality recording, mixing, mastering, sound design and
production in HCM based professional studio.
* Set up and tested equipment before events, broadcasts, and
recordings.
* Used special software to mix and edit tracks, including Pro Tools,
Ableton Live and Logic
* Collaborated with producers and performers to determine and achieve
the desired sound for productions.
RICE & PARTNERS
march 2016 - Present
Sound editor/ Recordist
* Captured and recorded audio using standard field audio equipment.
* Field recording with a range of high end, professional microphones and
digital recorders
Phone +84964368764
Email yudsaigon@gmail.com
Address
HCMC, Vietnam
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Creative Audio Editor with
strengths in recording, editing,
and mixing. Offering a diverse
background with expertise in Pro
Tools and Ableton Live. An
articulate communicator with
strong organization skills.
SKILLS
Pro Tools
Ableton Live
Logic Pro
Logical thinking and creative
Public Speaking
EDUCATION
orange wolves
Oct 2017 - NOV 2017
Major: electronic music production
VATC
Oct 2010 - May 2011
Major: Business English
INTERESTS
Music is my religion, the groove
is my temple.
CERTIFICATIONS
TOEIC Certificate with score 775 issued
2014
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
https://vimeo.com/daoqngduy
